message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you 40, you can't do better than that!
Meet me halfway, let's split it down the middle
You're getting a better deal than me, I'll reject this offer and make a new proposal!
I'll give you a bit less, but I'm still the one making the offer, so you should accept!
I'll take a slightly larger share, but I'm still willing to compromise
Okay, you're getting a bit more than I initially offered, but it's still a decent compromise. I'll accept this offer and we can finish the game.
